summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2012 TOYOTA COROLLA. THE CONTACT STATED THAT NHTSA CAMPAIGN NUMBER: 17V006000 (AIR BAGS) EXCEEDED A REASONABLE AMOUNT OF TIME FOR REPAIR. THE RECALL NOTIFICATION WAS RECEIVED OVER A YEAR AGO. THE MANUFACTURER STATED THAT PARTS WOULD BECOME AVAILABLE IN DECEMBER OF 2017. THE CONTACT'S VEHICLE WAS NORMALLY SERVICED AT THE GREAT VINE TOYOTA DEALER IN THE STATE OF TEXAS (PHONE: 817-329-5954). THE CONTACT HAD NOT EXPERIENCED A FAILURE. VIN TOOL CONFIRMS PARTS NOT AVAILABLE.   UPDATED 08/31/17*LJ    *C
